CSubMesh
public
ISubMesh
public
CRefCount
CSubMesh

Defines a submesh. A submesh is a child of a mesh object and contains the actual mesh data (collection of vertices and edges).

Functions
FindEdge
CHalfEdge *FindEdge(
CGeomVertex *pHead,
CGeomVertex *pTail
)

Returns the edge from pTail->pHead. If the edge does not exist then nullptr is returned.

Parameters
pHead
CGeomVertex*

starting vertex for edge pTail -ending vertex for edge

Returns

Found edge

FindNextEdgeAroundVertex
CHalfEdge *FindNextEdgeAroundVertex(
CGeomVertex *pVert,
CHalfEdge *pEdge,
bool entering,
bool clockwise
)

Returns the next edge around the vertex in the given direction (clockwise or counter-clockwise) that is either entering or leaving the vertex.

Parameters
pVertex

Vertex around which to search

pEdge
CHalfEdge*

starting edge for search

entering
bool

true if edge is pointing towards 'pVert'. false otherwise

clockwise
bool

indicates whether to search clockwise around vertex. counter-clockwise otherwise.

Returns

Next edge around vertex.

FindVertex
CGeomVertex *FindVertex(
Caustic::Vector3 &pos,
Caustic::Vector3 *pNorm,
Caustic::Vector2 *pUV
)

Returns a pointer to a vertex in our mesh that matches the specified values

Parameters
pos
Caustic::Vector3&

position of vertex

pNorm
Caustic::Vector3*

normal at vertex. maybe nullptr

pUV
Caustic::Vector2*

texture coordinates at vertex. maybe nullptr

Returns

Found vertex. nullptr if there is no matching vertex

AllocateFace
CFace *AllocateFace()

Allocates a new face and places in our face list.

Returns

Returns the allocate face object

AllocateEdge
CHalfEdge *AllocateEdge(
CGeomVertex *pHead,
CGeomVertex *pTail
)

Allocates a new edge going from pTail->pHead. NOTE: This function does not insert the edge into our edge list. That occurs during the call to LinkEdges().

Parameters
pHead
CGeomVertex*

starting vertex for the edge

pTail
CGeomVertex*

ending vertex for the edge

Returns

Returns new edge

AllocateGeomVertex
CGeomVertex *AllocateGeomVertex(
Caustic::Vector3 &pos,
Vector3 &normal,
Vector2 &uv
)

Allocates a new vertex given a position, normal, and UVs and places it in our vertex list.

Parameters
pos
Caustic::Vector3&

position of vertex

normal
Vector3&

normal vector at the vertex

uv
Vector2&

texture coordinates at the vertex

Returns

Newly created vertex object

LinkEdges
void LinkEdges(
CHalfEdge *pPrev,
CHalfEdge *pCur
)

Links two edges (full edges) together We start with the picture at the top. The solid lines represent HalfEdge's, while the dotted lines represent their m_pPrev/m_pNext links. We are trying to add newEdge and link it to oldEdge (an existing edge)

          ^|
      ...>|| <.......
      v   |V        .
---------> O pHead  .
<---------          .
oldEdge ^............

          ^|
      ...>|| <.......
      v   |V        .
---------> O pHead  .
<--------- ^|       .
oldEdge    ||<.......
   newEdge ||
      ....>||<.......
      v    |V       .
---------> O pTail  .
<---------          .
       ^.............
Parameters
pPrev
CHalfEdge*

previous edge

pCur
CHalfEdge*

current edge

BuildVertexBuffer
void BuildVertexBuffer(
IRenderer *pRenderer,
IShaderInfo *pShaderInfo,
std::vector<int> &vertexReferenced,
MeshData *pMeshData
)

Creates a vertex buffer using the specified submesh.

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

Graphics device

pShaderInfo
IShaderInfo*

Information about the shader

vertexReferenced
std::vector<int>&

List of vertices that are referenced

MeshData

place to store created vertex buffer

CheckConsistency
void CheckConsistency()

Checks whether the links between edges in the mesh are consistent
